# package[version_required]: tag1, tag2, ...
# 
# feedparser>=6.0.8:        dev
# rich:                     cli
# sortedcontainers:         dev
# pytest:                   dev2
# tox:                      dev2

click:                      cli
colorama:                   cli
rich:                       dev, beautiful, extra
requests:                   dev, extra
numpy:                      extra
pandas:                     extra
matplotlib:                 extra
LunarCalendar>=0.0.9:       extra
